methods.apply:
Apply this function to the input chunk, returning an output chunk.

 The result is owned by this Context.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Chunk<? extendsShortToIntegerCastWithOffset.T>) - the chunk to transform
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.IntChunk<? extends ShortToIntegerCastWithOffset.T>) the result IntChunk
methods.close: Release any resources associated with this context. The context should not be used afterwards.

text: Cast the values in the input chunk to an int and add the specified offset.
